A4.text: The sacraments of initiation consist of baptism, confirmation, and the Eucharist.

A5.text: The sacraments of healing consist of penance and the anointing of the sick.

A6.text: The Catechism of the Catholic Church on the Seven Sacraments

A7.text: Canons and Decrees of the Council of Trent
